WITH UserAgeGroup AS ( SELECT u.user_id, u.gender, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.birth) / 365.25 / 10) * 10 AS age_group FROM tofit.User u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} ), SameAgeGenderUsers AS ( SELECT u.user_id FROM tofit.User u JOIN UserAgeGroup uag ON FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), u.birth) / 365.25 / 10) * 10 = uag.age_group AND u.gender = uag.gender WHERE u.user_id != #{userId} ) SELECT v.video_id, v.channel_name, v.title, v.thumbnail, v.url, v.cate_code, v.view_cnt FROM tofit.Video v JOIN tofit.Favorites f ON v.video_id = f.video_id JOIN SameAgeGenderUsers sagu ON f.user_id = sagu.user_id;
